intro: Psychotria jinotegensis, commonly known as the Jinotega Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to Central America, particularly found in the tropical regions of Nicaragua and Costa Rica. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments within tropical rainforests. Psychotria jinotegensis is notable for its potential medicinal properties and ecological role in its native habitat.
